definition: board/plank/plate/shutter/table tennis bat/clappers (music)/CL:塊|块[kuai4]/accented beat in Chinese music/hard/stiff/to stop smiling or look serious
to wipe/to erase/rubbing (brush stroke in painting)/to clean/to polish

sentences.english: The teacher asked who had thrown the eraser,but the class clammed up.
sentences.chinese: 老師問是誰扔的黑板擦，但全班學生保持沉默。

sentences.english: On the teacher's desk there's an eraser.
sentences.chinese: 在老師的桌上有一塊黑板擦。

sentences.english: She now often gets out her chalk and eraser to use the blackboard.
sentences.chinese: 她現在開始取出了用於黑板教學的粉筆和黑板擦。

sentences.english: The teacher beat chalk dust from erasers.
sentences.chinese: 老師撣掉黑板擦上的粉筆灰。

sentences.english: Please clean the blackboard with the eraser.
sentences.chinese: 請用這個板擦把黑板擦乾淨。

sentences.english: Please clean the blackboard with the eraser.
sentences.chinese: 請用這個板擦把黑板擦乾淨。

sentences.english: He wiped out the names on the board.
sentences.chinese: 老師用黑板擦子擦去黑板上的字。

sentences.english: Obviously whiteboards require markers and erasers.
sentences.chinese: 當然，白板需要有配套的馬克筆和板擦。

sentences.english: Have you seen the chalk and the blackboard eraser ?
sentences.chinese: 你們知道粉筆和黑板擦放在哪裏嗎？

sentences.english: Pass me your eraser to make the board clean.
sentences.chinese: 把你的擦子遞給我，我來把黑板擦乾淨。

sentences.english: The teacher erases the sentence with an eraser.
The teacher demand (that) we (should ) clean the black board before every class.
sentences.chinese: 老師要求我們在每節課上課之前把黑板擦乾淨。

sentences.english: Rub out chalk marks with an eraser.

definition: to write on the blackboard/writing on the blackboard
